Here is some python

import sys

def main(argv = None):
    if argv is None:
        argv = sys.argv[1:]
    print "Got %s" % ' '.join(argv)
    return 0

if __name__ == "__main__":
    sys.exit(main)

And maybe here is some Erlang

-module(shape).
-export([area/1, area/2])
area(X,Y) ->
    area({square, X, Y}).

area({square, X, Y}) when X > 0 andalso Y > 0 ->
    X * Y.
